title: Why Your Old Rice Harvesting Technique is Wasting Your Time

subtasks: Preparing the harvester for operation
Navigating the harvester through rows of crops
Ensuring efficient harvesting of each plant
Monitoring the harvester's autonomous technology
Verifying flawless movement and precision
Confirming the machine's ability to handle multiple tasks
Evaluating the harvester's small size
Assessing the machine's adaptability between crop rows
Verifying the precision of the autonomous technology
Confirming the machine's self-operation without an operator
Checking the machine's functions: planting, harvesting, sorting
Imagining the integration of small, accurate machines
Reflecting on the efficiency brought by such technology
Acknowledging the reduction in human labor required with automation
